BucketBalance.description: Represents and tracks the amount remained or owed for a certain type of service by certain customer

bucketType.description: Type of prepay balance bucket (e.g.: promotion, deposit, bonus, data, voice, or any other service type)

description.description: Text describing the contents of the balance managed by the bucket

href.description: A resource URI pointing to the resource in the OB that stores the detailed information for the bucket

id.description: Unique Identifier within the server for the bucket

name.description: Friendly name to identify the bucket

partyAccount.description: A reference to the account that owns the bucket

product.description: A reference to the product whose consumption is managed by the bucket. This is an array to allow scenarios where a given bucket is shared between different products.

realizingResource.description: A reference to the resource that realizes a product. This is an array to allow scenarios where a given bucket is shared between different resources.

relatedParty.description: Used to provide information about any other entity with relation to the balance, for instance to define customer hierarchy for the balance (e.g.: customerId, userId, )

reservedAmount.description: Indicate the reserved amount on the bucket

status.description: Status for the balance (active, expired, suspended)

validFor.description: The period for which the balance in the bucket is valid
